DataElement.preferredName: Notification Administration Reuse Template Study Activity Repeat Duration ISO21090.PQ.TIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An administrative activity defined at the global library level that represents the communication of a message to a recipient. EXAMPLE(S): An alert sent to a study PI that the study has reached 75% of target subject accrual. The period of time over which the activity is repeated.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Notification Administration Reuse Template Study Activity Repeat Duration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Informing by words.:Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:To use again.:Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions._Make or do or perform again.:The period of time during which something continues.

Concepts.definition: Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.
Something that establishes or serves as a pattern for reference; a form, mold, or pattern used as a guide to making something.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: Make or do or perform again.:The period of time during which something continues.

The period of time during which something continues.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains PQ to have units that describe a period of time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.
